channel.title: Posts - Stephan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Stephan's Blog

item.title: Cloud Certification - Essential Cloud Infrastructure
item.description: This is the second chapter of the way towards the Associate GCP Cloud Certification.

item.title: Cloud Certification - Core Infrastructure
item.description: This is a series of the way of reaching the Associate GCP Cloud Certification. For each chapter you'll find kinda reference document like this. The certification includes 4 chapter. This document comprehends the first one.

item.title: Windy and Warm
item.description: The fingerpicking category is the place I'll write about an amazing area of guitar music namely fingerpicking. Beside that I'll also present some self-recorded stuff. Hope you'll enjoy.
